item.title: Deep Learning (1) -- Activation Function
item.description: Introduction This is a summary of many kinds of activation functions. Activation Functions 1. Sigmoid Function \[\sigma (x) = \frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}\] \[\frac{\partial \sigma (x)}{\partial x} = \sigma (x)(1-\sigma (x))\] Output range: [0, 1] metrics: Historically popular since they have nice interpretation as a saturating “firing rate” of a neuron. Demetrics: Saturated neurons "kill" the gradients. When x becomes extremely large or negative large, the gradient will become nearly zero. When x equals to zero, it will be fine.
